# init()

**Initializer**

A non-scrolling form style with a trailing aligned column of labels next to a leading aligned column of values.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t call this initializer directly. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FormStyle/columns] static variable to create this style:

```swift
Form {
   ...
}
.formStyle(.columns)
```
